PPLoc: http://www.datatrak.com/company/privacy-policy/; corporate Intranet; and see link below
activities:
Primarily, DATATRAK collects clinical data provided by principal investigators via a secure internet site. 

Additionally, human resources data is collected for the provision of payroll, social insurance and other information from the US to the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)Drugs & Pharmaceuticals - (DRG)Computer Services - (CSV)Health Care Services - (HCS)
personaldata: All electronic personal information hosted on DATATRAK servers, including human resources data.
privacyprograms: DATATRAK International, Inc. is not a member of any privacy programs.
recoursemech:
American Arbitration Association (AAA) will be used for unresolved disputes that do not involve human resources data.  

For human resource data, the EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC will be utilized for dispute resolution.
